cast.overview: A seven-year-old chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.
cast.title: Searching for Bobby Fischer

cast.overview: When Will decides to tell his daughter the story of how he met her mother, he discovers that a second look at the past might also give him a second chance at the future.
cast.title: Definitely, Maybe

details.biography:
Max Pomeranc (pronounced Pomerantz; born March 21, 1984) is an American former child actor. Born in New York City, New York, his mother, Marion Hess Pomeranc, is an author, and his father, Abe Pomeranc, is a stock broker. He made his acting debut at the age of eight, playing the lead in the film Searching for Bobby Fischer, based on the childhood of International Master Josh Waitzkin. At the time Pomeranc appeared in the film, he was also one of the USA's top 20 chess players in his age group. Pomeranc next starred in the 1995 movie Fluke.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Max Pomeranc, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Max Pomeranc
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
